member_organisations: The Solar Impulse Foundation has create The World Alliance, which brings together the main actors in the field of clean technologies in order to create synergies that will ultimately speed-up the implementation of clean and profitable solutions that have the potential to address the environmental challenges of today.
fields_of_interest: Energy, Environment, Research and innovation, Public Health, Climate Action
eu_initiatives:
The actions undertaken by the European Commission and the European Parliament in the field of renewable energies, clean techs and energy efficiency. 
Especially the different directives that are linked to those fields
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
relevant_communication: Communication activities that are linked towards the different themes presented above.
goals__remit: Following the success of the first solar flight around the world, the Solar Impulse Foundation is dedicated to improving the quality of life on Earth by fast-tracking the implementation of clean and profitable solutions to encourage decision makers to adopt more ambitious environmental targets and energy policies.
